## Public Member Typedefs

### Allocator {#a8cd3b17214907efcbfe21077a4d57f05}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename KeyT, typename ValT&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>using llvm::IntervalMapImpl::NodeSizer&lt; KeyT, ValT &gt;::Allocator = 
      RecyclingAllocator&lt;BumpPtrAllocator, char, AllocBytes, CacheLineBytes&gt;</>}>
<a href="#a8cd3b17214907efcbfe21077a4d57f05">Allocator</a> - The recycling allocator used for both branch and leaf nodes.

This typedef is very likely to be identical for all IntervalMaps with reasonably sized entries, so the same allocator can be shared among different kinds of maps.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/intervalmap-h/#l00468">468</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/intervalmap-h">IntervalMap.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
